rows.label: tlk70000131_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I wanna play with Milt
and Satahiko again soon!

rows.label: tlk70000131_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm the only kid in all of Hyber Village,
so I don't get to play with kids my age
very often. It's a bit lonely sometimes...

rows.label: tlk70000131_02_msg0004
rows.name:
So you gotta come visit! 'Kay?
Promise me you will! And then we'll
play like there's no tomorrow!
